name: Elements (Nanto, VoidChaser, Infinite_Dev)
description:
Project: Elements is a 2D Rogue-Like. The game's goal is to complete all rooms by defeating the enemies in it. After completing a room the player can purchase a powerup.

This game was made by 4 students in one semester during our studies. The task was to develop a game without the help of a big engine. We used the OpenTK Library for the game.

We decided to puplish this game as open source: https://github.com/WaldemarLehner/Elements

It may be, that not everything in the source code has been translated into English yet.

Designer / Developer: https://nantodev.itch.io

Sound Design / Developer: https://infinite-dev.itch.io/

Developer: https://github.com/WaldemarLehner

Developer: https://itch.io/profile/voidchaser
